name: Magic Chase
description:
A little Roguelike I made for Ludum Dare 39.

I did it all: Coding, Art, and Game Design.

Be the Hero who will save your Kingdom by bringing back again the Power of Magic.

Obviously it's really buggy. I would love to work a bit more on it, but I'm already late to work today - the last day of the Jam. It's very unstable and there are some glitches. But I'm already happy I managed to put some procedural generation together. :)
